error_log:
Error: Error creating S3 bucket: AccessDenied: Access Denied
status code: 403, request id: EXAMPLE, host id: EXAMPLE
context: Terraform apply failed while creating an S3 bucket in us-west-2.
follow_up: The provider uses role arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/ci-terraform and it has s3:CreateBucket. Bucket policy is empty. The error is still AccessDenied in us-west-2.
